revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Open-Mesh |model=OM2P |revision=-HSv2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mesh node, access point |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |cpu1_cspeed=520 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=FL128PIFL |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS32M16DS-5T |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=open-mesh |default_ssid_regex=^open-mesh$ |default_ip= |default_user=root |default_pass=0p3nm35h |oui=AC:86:74 |oui_eth=AC:86:74 }} '''OM2P-HS 300Mbps Access Point'''
[https://www.open-mesh.com/index.php/products/om2p-hs.html On '''Open-Mesh''''s store] :[https://www.open-mesh.com/skin/frontend/default/open-mesh/images/om2p.pdf Datasheet]
The device uses two ''Lynwave'' ALA120-052022 antennas.
Difference between OM2P-HS and OM2P-HSv2: * OM2P-HS has 1 port supporting passive POE only. * OM2P-HSv2 (this device) has 1 port supporting passive POE only, and the ''2nd port'' supporting standard 802.11af POE.
The Passive PoE implementation in this device consists of a Passive PoE feed with pins +4,5 and -7,8 at 18 VDC.
